articles.description: Josh Philippe and Moises Henriques hit half-centuries as the Sydney Sixers posted their highest ever total in a record win in the BBL|11 season opener against the Melbourne Stars
articles.content:
Sixers thrash Stars in record-breaking display
A woeful batting display from an undermanned Melbourne Stars has handed the Sydney Sixers the dream start to their BBL title defence with a record vict… [+4632 chars]
